name: Ape's Banana Conquest
description:
Control the ape while he runs over some production lanes planted next to his beloved jungle.

Collect fruits to score and collect turtles to slow down your movement speed - which increases every run meter.

Avoid crashing into dead ends or palms.

And now... hurry up primate, here's a banana!

Content: The game only features an endless-mode, no campaign or so. Target of the game was to be a little 5-minute-break killer.

Side nodes: created in 2015 for a Monkey-X.com competition (site closed in 2018). It is written in Monkey-X but should be compileable in the FOSS successor "Cerberus-X". Some adjustmends needed to be done to the modules to allow proper cross-fading of multiple audio streams in the browsers.
